title: Access the Meta-Analytic Psychotherapy Databases
code: # List all available databases listData()  # Get latest version of the 'inpatients' database d <- getData("inpatients")  # Show variable description d$variableDescription()  # Open online documentation d$openDocumentation()  # Analyze using metapsyTools library(metapsyTools) runMetaAnalysis(d)

what: Import Metapsy databases into the R environment — getData
title: Import Metapsy databases into the R environment — getData
text: function allows download publicly available versions Metapsy databases R environment.

title: Import Metapsy databases into the R environment — getData
Import Metapsy databases into the R environment — getData
text: shorthand character. shorthand assigned database downloaded. Shorthands listed "Metadata" database documentation entry. Alternatively, available databases shortcodes can accessed running listData(). version character. version number downloaded. Default NULL, downloads latest version. include.metadata logical. set TRUE, function return R6::R6Class() object includes metadata associated database version. See "Value".

title: Import Metapsy databases into the R environment — getData
text: include.metadata set TRUE, getData function return requested dataset , well metadata associated within . Metadata items included default : database.doi: digital object identifier database ("Concept DOI" Zenodo API. DOI always resolve latest database version). documentation.url: URL database documentation entry Metapsy Documentation page. github.repo.url: URL specific Github repository state database released. last.search: Date last search. last.updated: Date last database updated (release). license: License database. repository.download.url: Link download entire database Zenodo. title: Title database (including version). variable.description: Description variables included dataset. version: Version database. version.doi: DOI associated specific version database. contrast database.doi, identifier also link specific database version. returned R6::R6Class() object also contains helpful functions, can called directly object: downloadZip(): download database (including metadata) .zip file Zenodo repository. openDocumentation(): opens database documentation entry Metapsy Documentation page. openGitRepo(): opens Github repository database state release. returnMetadata(): Returns entire metadata stored metapsyDatabase R6 object list. variableDescription(): prints variable description database R Console. include.metadata FALSE, function return dataset simple data.frame.

title: Import Metapsy databases into the R environment — getData
text: Mathias Harrer mathias.h.harrer@gmail.com

title: Import Metapsy databases into the R environment — getData
code: if (FALSE) { # List all available databases listData()  # Get latest version of the 'depression-psyctr' database d <- getData("depression-psyctr")  # Get version 22.2.0 of the 'depression-psyctr' database d <- getData("depression-psyctr", "22.2.0")  # Show variable description d$variableDescription()  # Open online documentation d$openDocumentation()  # Analyze using metapsyTools library(metapsyTools) runMetaAnalysis(d) }

title: List all available databases — listData
text: function lists publicly available Metapsy databases. prints database shorthands, can used import data using getData().

title: List all available databases — listData
List all available databases — listData
text: Returns data.frame available databases shorthand, along URL database documentation entry.

title: List all available databases — listData
text: Mathias Harrer mathias.h.harrer@gmail.com

title: List all available databases — listData
code: if (FALSE) { # List all available databases listData()  # Get latest version of the 'depression-psyctr' database d <- getData("depression-psyctr")  # Get version 22.2.0 of the 'depression-psyctr' database d <- getData("depression-psyctr", "22.2.0")  # Show variable description d$variableDescription()  # Open online documentation d$openDocumentation()  # Analyze using metapsyTools library(metapsyTools) runMetaAnalysis(d) }

title: Open database documentation — openDocs
text: function opens online documentation imported database.

title: Open database documentation — openDocs

text: data database data.frame imported using getData().

title: Open database documentation — openDocs
text: Opens database documentation entry docs.metapsy.org.

title: Open database documentation — openDocs
text: Mathias Harrer mathias.h.harrer@gmail.com

title: Open database documentation — openDocs
code: if (FALSE) { # List all available databases listData()  # Get latest version of the 'depression-psyctr' database d <- getData("depression-psyctr")  # Get version 22.2 of the 'depression-psyctr' database d <- getData("depression-psyctr")  # Show variable description variableDescription(d)  # Open online documentation openDocs(d) }

code: if (FALSE) { # List all available databases listData()  # Get latest version of the 'depression-psyctr' database d <- getData("depression-psyctr")  # Get version 22.2 of the 'depression-psyctr' database d <- getData("depression-psyctr")  # Show variable description variableDescription(d)  # Open online documentation openDocs(d) }
